subject: Mental Health
title: Purging Methods and Dangers
description: A 60-second lesson on Purging Methods and Dangers.

hook.text: Vomiting isn't the only purge method â€” and all of them can be deadly.

buildup.text: Laxatives, diuretics, excessive exercise, and fasting are all forms of purging behavior.

discovery.text: Laxative abuse causes severe dehydration and electrolyte imbalances that affect the heart.

twist.text: Exercise purging is often praised by others, making it the hardest form to recognize.

climax.text: Any compensatory behavior driven by guilt after eating is a form of purging.

punchline.text: When exercise is punishment, it's no longer healthy.

quiz.question: Why is exercise purging difficult to identify?
options: Society praises excessive exercise, disguising the behavior
